title: Pvp.net Patcher Kernal error
body:
I haven't changed any settings nor had my PC had any updates. I've disabled IP Helper, run as administrator, put my Avast on silent gaming mode, tried shutting own anti-virus, tried to run in compatibility mode (with XP sp2, Vista sp2, Windows 7 etc), and it was running fine until last night and this morning it suddenly happened for the third time and it isn't working.

Here is a copy of rads_user_kernel.

replies.body:
Hi there. If you guys are looking for a solution please check this one:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/fTGsdZLk-solution-for-patcher-kernel

Hey StoneGiantTiny,

If you haven't already - check out our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) support article and try some of the steps there.  I'd definitely check out the "force a re-patch" steps in your case.

Cheers
Mindstar
